articles.title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect arrested, Trump says 'We have him in custody'
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced that authorities have a high degree of certainty they have apprehended the suspect in the shooting of conservative commentator Charlie Kirk. The suspect was taken into custody.

articles.title: Bolsonaro sentenced to 27 years for plotting military coup in Brazil
articles.description: Former Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro has been sentenced to over 27 years in prison after being convicted of attempting to stage a military coup.

articles.title: Boat capsizes in Congo, killing at least 86 people, most of them students
articles.description: A tragic incident in the Democratic Republic of Congo resulted in the deaths of at least 86 people when a boat capsized. The majority of the victims were students.
